name: レガイア伝説
summary:
Legend of Legaia (レガイア伝説 Regaia Densetsu) is a PlayStation action role-playing game developed by Prokion and Contrail. It was followed by Legaia 2: Duel Saga.
The player can input any commands for each characters, selects a target and confirms the selection on the battle screen. The action phase has each characters performing their own. The order is prescribed between stats and equipment. The damage is shown for the "Tactical Arts System". Instead of simply selecting a 'Fight' command for a physical attack, the player specifies the location of each ones; 'Right' and 'Left' strike with both arms, and 'High' and 'Low' strike on heights. Each directions has the ability, depending on opponents, equipped weapons and level of the character's skill. Each characters perform a string of each attacks. The gauge increases and their attack for each turn. The number of strikes is used and affected by several factors for each status.
